answer: I'm making a game called Lodestar: Stygian Skies.
LSS is written in Java and uses JSON and Javascript for modding.
I use a custom engine. Portions of the engine were inspired by or derived from JMonkeyEngine 3.
Sure can! I've got some Humble Widgets set up - www.sudoplaygames.com/lss/preorder/

query: What kind of game is this?
answer: Lodestar: Stygian Skies is a procedural, voxel-based, tactical, sci-fi role-playing game that takes place in the dark, futuristic expanse of the Lodestar Universe. Explore planets, find resources, unlock unit classes, augment your team and engage in turn-based combat on destructible terrain.

query: Can I look at your bot code?
